casebody.data:
Juan GUZMAN
v.
Zeynullah YEROZ et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016

Hugh D. Hughes, in support of the petition.

James S. Brownstein and Robert F. Carter, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 420, 143 A.3d 661 (2016), is denied.
